about_the_game:
The Roundabout Deluxe Edition DLC includes a crazy amount of behind the scenes content and exclusive features, including:

  • Georgio Cam - Play the exclusive April Fool's build that lets you experience Roundabout from a first person perspective. No Goblin is not responsible for the inevitable nausea.
  • Screenplay/Art Book compendium - The full 87 page FMV screenplay, annotated with concept art, notes, and other great behind the scenes commentary on the development of Roundabout.
  • Early Builds - As well as our public demo builds from PAX and our announce trailer, you can also play the prototypes and pitch builds that led to the Roundabout you know and love today.
  • Unreleased Trailers - We made a lot of videos. Some were for internal use, some were so terrible that we decided to cut them. All of them are included. Yes, even the terrible ones.
  • Soundtrack - The full Roundabout soundtrack is also included.
detailed_description:
The Roundabout Deluxe Edition DLC includes a crazy amount of behind the scenes content and exclusive features, including:

  • Georgio Cam - Play the exclusive April Fool's build that lets you experience Roundabout from a first person perspective. No Goblin is not responsible for the inevitable nausea.
  • Screenplay/Art Book compendium - The full 87 page FMV screenplay, annotated with concept art, notes, and other great behind the scenes commentary on the development of Roundabout.
  • Early Builds - As well as our public demo builds from PAX and our announce trailer, you can also play the prototypes and pitch builds that led to the Roundabout you know and love today.
  • Unreleased Trailers - We made a lot of videos. Some were for internal use, some were so terrible that we decided to cut them. All of them are included. Yes, even the terrible ones.
  • Soundtrack - The full Roundabout soundtrack is also included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on SteamOS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or faster
  • Additional Notes: Early builds and Georgio Cam only available on Windows. All other content accessible on Linux.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Snow Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or faster
  • Additional Notes: Early builds and Georgio Cam only available on Windows. All other content accessible on Mac OS X.

name: Roundabout Deluxe Edition Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 with SP1 or later, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or faster
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 570 or equivalent required for early builds.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Requirements only for early versions of the game. All other content will run on any computer that can run Steam.

short_description: The Roundabout Deluxe Edition DLC includes a crazy amount of behind the scenes content and exclusive features. Soundtrack, Unreleased Trailers, Early Builds, Art Book and Screenplay, and even "Georgio Cam" - the first person version of Roundabout.
